${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Bring your LAN up to light speed A new local area network solution promises to bring a significant increase in performance – and significant cost savings – to your organization. How? By bringing your LAN up to light speed.
Passive Optical LAN is the LAN for your future, and it outperforms a traditional Ethernet-over-copper LAN everywhere you look.
On our new website, you will find all the business and user benefits of Passive Optical LAN to decide if it is right for you. (Spoiler alert: it is).
- Learn how you can achieve up to 50% savings on CAPEX and OPEX.
- Understand the technology that powers Passive Optical LAN. (Hint: it also powers the internet).
- Estimate your potential cost savings with our LAN Savings Calculator.
- Download brochures and technical insights.
- View customer cases and testimonials.
Wherever you are in your plans for your LAN, Nokia Passive Optical LAN can improve them. Visit our website to learn more. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
